Uses of Class
RateLimiter.Throttle

  • Uses of Throttle in RateLimiter

    Subclasses of Throttle in RateLimiter
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  TestThrottle
    This class is for demo and testing purposes, this class extends Throttle class and it takes necessary action based on if a request has exceeded the limit or not.
    Fields in RateLimiter declared as Throttle
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) Throttle TestRunThread.throttle
    This is used for call back.
    Methods in RateLimiter with parameters of type Throttle
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Api.requested​(Throttle throttle)
    Calculates if a user has exceeded his limit and takes appropriate action.
    void Manager.requested​(java.lang.String userID, java.lang.String apiID, Throttle throttle)
    When a user requests for an Api, this method will be called and it will identify the user send's the request to that User object.
    void User.requested​(java.lang.String apiID, Throttle throttle)
    This will send the request to the appropriate Api, and if api is not present it will add the api implicitly.
    Constructors in RateLimiter with parameters of type Throttle
    Constructor Description
    TestRunThread​(Manager manager, Throttle throttle)
    Used for initializing the references of manager and throttle.
